abstract.para: This is a sample XML documentation file demonstrating various DocBook elements.

section.title: Introduction
section.para: This document demonstrates various XML elements that can be used in DocBook documentation. It includes sections, lists, tables, code examples, and more.
DocBook is a semantic markup language for technical documentation. It allows you to create content that can be published in various formats including HTML, PDF, and EPUB.
